name: Slam Bam Arena
description:
Slam Bam Arena is a 2D fighting game that aims to capture the feeling of classic arcade fighting games while also taking inspiration from more recent Anime/ air dasher fighting games. 

This is a very early build that has not been tested with 2 player mode very much at all yet. The training room is very bare bones and theres no menus to exit the modes right now. Im getting on it soon. This build is mostly meant to just play around with the system mechanics that are there right now (a few key ones arent fully implemented yet). 

There are many missing assets and some moves functionality are not fully done.

there are 4 characters currently with 9 planned.

Announcer sound clips still need to be added into the build.
